description:
With the combined information from the other captives, Jill sees through the Marquess Beil`s plot. Realizing that she must act quickly, and knowing that the others may not trust her, she takes a chance and asks for help. Will it be enough?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: The Situation Is Desperate, but as the God of War`s Daughter, I Will Defeat the Enemy with Brute Strength
Zetsubouteki Joukyou Deshita ga Gunshin Reijou na no de, Butsuri de Musou Shite Yarou to Omoimasu
絶望的状況でしたが軍神令嬢なので, 物理で無双してやろうと思います
